changelog: Database updated: new column added to distinguish between vehicle and item transactions
Automatically mark vehicle purchases as claimed
Show different information in the history page based on transaction type
Update the webhook logs to properly format vehicle purchase information
Removed unnecessary delays in the purchase process
Immediately request new listings after purchase
Make the interface more responsive and interactive
Made styles more maintainable and specific to the items market
Correct buyer/seller name displayed on the history page
Organized information in a clearer hierarchy
Added a filter for vehicle and item transactions in the History page
Added filter buttons for All, Vehicles, and Items
